p: Female 21 day old C57BL/6J mice were inoculated s.c. in the pectoral area with 10 3 plaque-forming units (PFU) of RRV (T48 strain) as described [ 34]. Disease was determined by assessing grip strength and gait, and scored as follows: 0 = no disease; 1 = ruffled fur, 2 = very mild hind limb weakness; 3 = mild hind limb weakness; 4 = moderate hind limb weakness; 5 = severe hind limb weakness/dragging; 6 = complete loss of hind limb function, as described [ 34].
